<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
<style>
* {box-sizing: border-box;}
.mySlides {display: none;}
img {vertical-align: middle;}


/* Position the image container (needed to position the left and right arrows) */
.container {
  position: relative;
}
/* Hide the images by default */
.mySlides {
  display: none;
}
/* Caption text - no longer used */
.text {
  color: #f2f2f2;
  font-size: 15px;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 8px;
  width: 100%;
  text-align: center;
}
/* Number text (1/3 etc) */
.numbertext {
  color: #f2f2f2;
  font-size: 12px;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
}
/* The dots/bullets/indicators */
.dot {
  height: 15px;
  width: 15px;
  margin: 0 2px;
  background-color: #bbb;
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: background-color 0.6s ease;
}
.active {
  background-color: #717171;
}
/* Fading animation */
.fade {
  -webkit-animation-name: fade;
  -webkit-animation-duration: 3.5s;
  animation-name: fade;
  animation-duration: 3.5s;
}
/* Add a pointer when hovering over the thumbnail images */
.cursor {
  cursor: pointer;
}
/* Next & previous buttons */
.prev,
.next {
  cursor: pointer;
  position: absolute;
  top: 40%;
  width: auto;
  padding: 16px;
  margin-top: -50px;
  color: white;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 20px;
  border-radius: 0 3px 3px 0;
  user-select: none;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
}

/* Position the "next button" to the right */
.next {
  right: 0;
  border-radius: 3px 0 0 3px;
}

/* On hover, add a black background color with a little bit see-through */
.prev:hover,
.next:hover {
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
}

/* Number text (1/3 etc) */
.numbertext {
  color: #f2f2f2;
  font-size: 12px;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
}

/* Container for image text */
.caption-container {
  text-align: center;
  background-color: #696969;
  padding: 2px 16px;
  color: white;
}

.row:after {
  content: "";
  display: table;
  clear: both;
}

/* Six columns side by side */
.column {
  float: left;
  width: 16.66%;
}

/* Add a transparency effect for thumnbail images */
.demo {
  opacity: 0.6;
}

.active,
.demo:hover {
  opacity: .8;
}

@-webkit-keyframes fade {
  from {opacity: .4} 
  to {opacity: 1}
}
@keyframes fade {
  from {opacity: .4} 
  to {opacity: 1}
}
/* On smaller screens, decrease text size */
@media only screen and (max-width: 300px) {
  .text {font-size: 11px}
}
</style>
</head>

<body>
<h2>A few snapshots</h2>

<div class="container">
<div class="mySlides ">
  <div class="numbertext">1 / 6</div>
  <img src="images/gallery/2018_WFB161_electroshocking.JPG" style="width:100%">
</div>

<div class="mySlides">
  <div class="numbertext">2 / 6</div>
  <img src="images/gallery/2018_WFB161_salmon_hole.JPG" style="width:100%">
</div>

<div class="mySlides">
  <div class="numbertext">3 / 6</div>
  <img src="images/gallery/2018_WFB161_seining.JPG" style="width:100%">
</div>
  
<div class="mySlides">
  <div class="numbertext">4 / 6</div>
  <img src="images/gallery/2018_shelburne_pond_frog.JPG" style="width:100%">
</div>

<div class="mySlides">
  <div class="numbertext">5 / 6</div>
  <img src="images/gallery/2019_pumpkinseed.JPG" style="width:100%">
</div>
<div class="mySlides">
  <div class="numbertext">6 / 6</div>
  <img src="images/gallery/2016_Como16_Sampling.JPG" style="width:100%">
</div>
  
<a class="prev" onclick="plusSlides(-1)">❮</a>
<a class="next" onclick="plusSlides(1)">❯</a>
  
<div class="caption-container">
  <p id="caption"></p>
</div>
  
<div class="row">
  <div class="column">
  <img class="demo cursor" src="images/gallery/2018_WFB161_electroshocking.JPG" style="width:100%" onclick="currentSlide(1)" alt="Electroshocking in Lewis Creek, Charlotte, VT, with WFB 161 students (UVM)">
  </div>
  <div class="column">
  <img class="demo cursor" src="images/gallery/2018_WFB161_salmon_hole.JPG" style="width:100%" onclick="currentSlide(2)" alt="Salmon Hole, Burlington, VT">
  </div>
  <div class="column">
  <img class="demo cursor" src="images/gallery/2018_WFB161_seining.JPG" style="width:100%" onclick="currentSlide(3)" alt="Seining in Shelburne Bay, VT, with WFB 161 students (UVM)">
  </div>
  <div class="column">
  <img class="demo cursor" src="images/gallery/2018_shelburne_pond_frog.JPG" style="width:100%" onclick="currentSlide(4)" alt="Shelburne Pond, VT">
  </div>
  <div class="column">
  <img class="demo cursor" src="images/gallery/2019_pumpkinseed.JPG" style="width:100%" onclick="currentSlide(5)" alt="Pumkinseed, Shelburne Pond, VT">
  </div>    
  <div class="column">
  <img class="demo cursor" src="images/gallery/2016_Como16_Sampling.JPG" style="width:100%" onclick="currentSlide(6)" alt="Sampling Lake Como core, Verbania, IT">
  </div>
</div>
</div>

<script>
var slideIndex = 1;
showSlides(slideIndex);

function plusSlides(n) {
  showSlides(slideIndex += n);
}

function currentSlide(n) {
  showSlides(slideIndex = n);
}

function showSlides(n) {
  var i;
  var slides = document.getElementsByClassName("mySlides");
  var dots = document.getElementsByClassName("demo");
  var captionText = document.getElementById("caption");
  if (n > slides.length) {slideIndex = 1}
  if (n < 1) {slideIndex = slides.length}
  for (i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
      slides[i].style.display = "none";
  }
  for (i = 0; i < dots.length; i++) {
      dots[i].className = dots[i].className.replace(" active", "");
  }
  slides[slideIndex-1].style.display = "block";
  dots[slideIndex-1].className += " active";
  captionText.innerHTML = dots[slideIndex-1].alt;
  //setTimeout(showSlides, 4000); // Change image every 4 seconds
}
</script>
</body>
</html>
